/usr/bin/c++   -O2 -g -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/OgrePong.dir/Ball.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OgrePong.dir/Paddle.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OgrePong.dir/Pong.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OgrePong.dir/Pongmain.cpp.o  -o bin/OgrePong -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libOgreMain.so -lboost_thread -lboost_date_time -lboost_system -lboost_atomic -lboost_chrono -lpthread -lOIS /usr/local/lib/libOgreOverlay.so /usr/local/lib/libOgreAL.so.0.0.0 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
